hypothesis_content.title: Multi-Timeframe Support Cluster in STRESS Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes, when BTC price simultaneously tests: 1) 200-day MA, 2) Weekly volume-weighted average price (VWAP), and 3) 0.618 Fibonacci retracement of prior 90-day range - with 4-hour RSI(14) < 30, signals high-probability regime transition to NEUTRAL within 3-5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Confluence of major technical supports during stress events creates strong buying zones for institutions and long-term holders. Multi-timeframe alignment reduces false signals. RSI oversold on 4-hour confirms exhaustion.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 1.5% of weekly VWAP
Price at 0.618 Fib of prior 90-day range ±2%
STRESS regime active (VIX > 25 or crypto fear index < 20)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Daily close >3% below all three support levels
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days if no meaningful bounce (>5%) occurs

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Cluster zone breaks downward with >3% daily close below all levels in more than 40% of occurrences during stress events.
